players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob, I was with Diana. Alice, you must be mistaken."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed last night. Charlie's claim of innocence is false. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Alice, I trust your investigation. Vote Charlie."
You: "I confirm Charlie is mafia, Bob was killed last night. No evidence against Diana. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "I trust Alice's detective work. Charlie claimed to be with me, but I was alone. No evidence against me. Vote Charlie to stop the killer."
Charlie: "Alice, you must be mistaken. I was with Diana. Bob's death was a mistake. Diana is innocent."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Bob, I was with Diana. Alice, you must be mistaken."
Alice: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed last night. Charlie's claim of innocence is false. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Alice, I trust your investigation. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I confirm Charlie is mafia, Bob was killed last night. No evidence against Diana. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "I trust Alice's detective work. Charlie claimed to be with me, but I was alone. No evidence against me. Vote Charlie to stop the killer."
You: "Alice, you must be mistaken. I was with Diana. Bob's death was a mistake. Diana is innocent."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
